content: and knit them together through the back loop decrease left leaning sl1wyif slip one with yarn in front - slip one stitch from the left needle to the right needle with the yarn held in front of the work sl1wyib slip one with yarn in back - slip one stitch from the left needle to the right needle with the yarn held in the back of the work ktbl or tbl knit through the back loop gsr turn german short row turn - knit up until the stitch where the pattern says gsr turn turn your work bring your yarn to the front and slip one stitch purlwise from the left needle to the right needle pull the yarn over the right needle and to the back of your work until you have created a double stitch continue to work as normal pm place stitch marker bor beginning of round slm slip_stitch marker from the left needle to the right needle mc main color - sample is knit with navy as the main color cc contrast color - sample is knit with white as the contrast color rs right side of your work ws wrong side of you work 7 january socks by allison rose
